# Features

*The below are features listed by the original developer*

* Markdown Syntax Processing

* Page Tags

* Regex Search

* Random URLs

* Web Editor

* Server-side Editing

* REST API

*The following are features designed and implemented by the EssyWiki team*

* Enhanced Markdown Editor w/ Toolbar

* Image Upload to Server via Editor

* User Index

* User Manager (Web Interface and REST API)

* User Permissions and Security

* Page Category Structure

* Page Edit History
